```coq
intros h st client id c out st' ms H.
destruct H as [H1 H2].
split.
- apply update_elections_data_client_request_allEntries with (h := h) (st := st) (client := client) (id := id) (c := c) (out := out) (st' := st') (ms := ms); auto.

exists e; repeat split; auto.
apply handleClientRequest_log with (h := h) (st := snd st) (client := client) (id := id) (c := c) (out := out) (st' := st') (ps := ms); auto.
Qed.
